channel.title: 🏢 CNRS@CREATE LTD on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 CNRS@CREATE LTD on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Approximation Rate of the Transformer Architecture for Sequence Modeling
item.description: This paper unveils the Transformer’s approximation power, deriving explicit Jackson-type rates to reveal its strengths and limitations in handling various sequential relationships.
